attributes.action: Distressing infants for entertainment in TV/film should be made illegal.
attributes.background: Babies and infants are frightened for the sake of drama in films and TV.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. The Ofcom Broadcast Code already makes clear that people under eighteen must not be caused unnecessary distress or anxiety by their involvement in programmes. You can read the Code here:

https://www.ofcom.org.uk/__data/assets/pdf_file/0005/100103/broadcast-code-april-2017.pdf

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
